summary:
This adds a spell that will make dragons attack you instead of just circling you.

This does not make dragons work for you or summon dragons.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=Gold][size=15]Dragon calling[/size][/color][/center] 
[line]
[center][color=Gold][size=4]by bwins95[/size][/color][/center] 
[color=Gold][size=3]Version             :[/size][/color]1.0
[color=Gold][size=3]Date                :[/size][/color]08/13/2012
[color=Gold][size=3]Category            :[/size][/color]Magic - Spells & enchantments
[line] 
[line] 

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Description[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]This is adds a spell that can be cast at dragons as they circle and make them attack you or something nearby. line the crosshair up with the dragon and hold the button down. after a few seconds the dragon will be taking very little to no damage, but it will agro on you as if you attacked it.

This does not summon dragons or make them work for you.[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Detail[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]The spell book is hidden in dragonsreach.  here\'s a hint, it\'s a magic item, so check there first.  this is not a fire and forget spell like fire bolt. it is a hold the button and fire as long as it is held spell. it is not named like other spell tomes.[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Location[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Dragonsreach castle in whiterun.[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]History[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]1.0
Upload[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Upgrade[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Replace the esp.[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Known Issues and Bugs[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]The dragon may not attack you directly. it may attack something else and then some back at you.[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Incompatibilities[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Their should be none, but if you find any let me know.[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Contact[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]PM on nexus[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Manual installation[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Extract the esp and drop it in the Skyrim Data folder.[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Nexus Mod Manager Installation[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Download it to the manager and check the box next to it.[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Manual Uninstallation[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Delete the esp.[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Nexus Mod Manager Uninstallation[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Disable the mod and delete from NMM.[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Tools Used:[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[list]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25859/]TES5Edit[/url] 
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/modmanager/]Nexus Mod Manager[/url] 
[*]Creation Kit: Downloadable on th steam network.
[*][url=http://www.7-zip.org/download.html]7Zip[/url] 
[/list] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Legal and Licensing[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Before you use the content first contact me and ask for permission[/center] 
[line]
